pr_title: Always set "JAR manifest" cmd line shortener for new run configs

timeline.bodyText:
Given pants plugin doesn't bring scala runtime into intellij but relies only on intellij's scala plugin, so if scala plugin isn't enabled, it will likely explode here. Do you think it would be okay to rewrite this java?
If this is only for running scala main class, we can move the meta info resources//META-INF/pants-scala.xml and keep this scala.
timeline.author: wisechengyi

timeline.message: Always set "JAR manifest" cmd line shortener for new run configs
